epics.title: Project Setup and Infrastructure
epics.summary: Establish foundational environment for development and deployment.
epics.description: Set up the project structure, repositories, and necessary development environments for the application. This includes configuring source control, setting up CI/CD pipelines, choosing hosting solutions, and defining coding standards. The goal is to create a scalable and maintainable architecture that supports efficient collaboration among developers.

epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and role-based authorization system.
epics.description: Develop functionality for users to sign up, log in, and manage their accounts using secure authentication mechanisms such as OAuth or JWT. Define user roles and permissions to control access to different parts of the system. Implement password encryption, validation, and account recovery features to ensure strong security practices.

epics.title: Core Application Features
epics.summary: Build the core functional modules that define the main purpose of the application.
epics.description: Design and develop the main modules that drive the application's primary functionality. Define key entities, workflows, and interactions. Ensure the features are user-friendly, reliable, and align with the project’s objectives. These core features will be the backbone of user engagement and operational success.

epics.title: Enhanced User Experience and Interface Design
epics.summary: Improve the application’s interface for intuitiveness and usability.
epics.description: Focus on refining the front-end design and implementing advanced UI/UX principles to make the user experience seamless and visually appealing. Conduct usability tests, collect feedback, and iterate on design improvements. Introduce responsive layouts and accessibility compliance for inclusivity.

epics.title: Notifications and Integrations
epics.summary: Add support for notifications and integrate third-party services.
epics.description: Create an event-driven notification system using email, SMS, or push notifications to keep users informed of relevant activities. Integrate with external systems such as analytics, payment gateways, or data providers to enhance the app’s capabilities and operational connectivity.

epics.title: Reporting and Analytics
epics.summary: Implement reporting and analytics tools for performance tracking.
epics.description: Develop dashboards and reporting mechanisms to monitor system metrics, user engagement, and business KPIs. Integrate analytics tools and create data visualizations that provide actionable insights to stakeholders. Ensure reports are configurable, exportable, and easy to interpret.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Scalability
epics.summary: Enhance system performance and prepare for scalability.
epics.description: Analyze and optimize the backend and frontend performance, addressing bottlenecks in data handling, API response times, and rendering performance. Implement caching, load balancing, and database optimization solutions. Prepare the system to handle larger user loads without degradation in performance.

epics.title: Security Hardening and Compliance
epics.summary: Ensure system security and compliance with regulations.
epics.description: Perform security assessments, vulnerability scans, and penetration testing to identify and resolve weaknesses. Implement robust logging, monitoring, and incident response plans. Ensure compliance with applicable standards such as GDPR, HIPAA, or PCI-DSS depending on the project’s domain.

epics.title: Deployment and Release Management
epics.summary: Finalize and deploy the application to production environments.
epics.description: Prepare for a stable rollout by setting up deployment pipelines, environment configurations, and rollback strategies. Conduct final QA testing, performance tests, and ensure documentation is complete. Coordinate with all teams to ensure a smooth go-live process and implement monitoring post-release.

user_stories.title: Set up project structure and repositories
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to set up the project structure and repositories, so that the application's foundational environment is established for development and deployment.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Project structure configured. 2. Repositories created and accessible. 3. Coding standards document available.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, when I initialize the structure and repositories, then they should be accessible and follow the coding standards.

user_stories.title: Configure source control and CI/CD pipelines
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to configure source control and CI/CD pipelines, so that code management and deployment are automated and consistent.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Source control configured. 2. CI/CD pipelines set up. 3. Automated build and deploy process validated.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a configured repository, when code is pushed, then the CI/CD pipeline should automatically build and deploy the application.

user_stories.title: Choose and set up hosting solutions
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to choose and set up hosting solutions, so that the application is hosted on a reliable and scalable infrastructure.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Hosting solution selected. 2. Infrastructure set up and tested for scalability.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a list of hosting options, when a solution is chosen, then the infrastructure should be set up and scalable.

user_stories.title: Implement secure user sign-up and log-in
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to securely sign up and log in, so that I can access my account with authentication mechanisms like OAuth or JWT.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Secure sign-up process implemented. 2. Log-in with OAuth or JWT. 3. Data encryption and validation accurate.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user, when they sign up, then their data should be securely stored and validated for log-in.

user_stories.title: Define user roles and permissions
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to define user roles and permissions, so that access control is maintained within different parts of the system.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User roles defined. 2. Permissions aligned with roles. 3. Access control validated.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an admin, when roles and permissions are set, then access should be controlled based on these definitions.

user_stories.title: Design and develop key entities and workflows
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to design and develop key entities and workflows, so that the main functionality of the application is clearly defined and user-friendly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Key entities designed. 2. Workflows developed. 3. User-friendly interface tested.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core application, when entities and workflows are defined, then the main functionality should be reliable and user-friendly.

user_stories.title: Ensure core features align with project objectives
user_stories.description: As a product owner, I want to ensure core features align with project objectives, so that the app drives user engagement and operational success.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Features documented. 2. Alignment with objectives validated. 3. Positive user feedback collected.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the project objectives, when core features are evaluated, then they should align with the predefined objectives.
